reviewText: Without a doubt, the best line dance series...  Country Line Dancing has never been more popular out of the dance floor and doing the "Hip-Hop" and many other popular. Learn the 'Hip-Hop', the "Bubba", and "The Cowboy Cha Cha (Couples Dance)" Professional instructor Judi McDonald demonstrates each step in an easy to follow style, and then runs through the complete dance to music.
